property.name: adminsettings
property.label: Turn on admin settings (only shows to those assigned to Marq_Admin)
property.description: Enables the admin settings to configure template filter mapping and data

property.name: textboxFields
property.label: SFDC Fields to Use
property.description: Add each SFDC field you want to use in the format of OBJECT.FIELD1, OBJECT.FIELD2, OBJECT.FIELD3. e.g. 'Opportunity.StageName, Opportunity.Industry, Opportunity.category__c'

property.name: textboxFilters
property.label: Corresponding Marq Filters
property.description: Add each corresponding Marq filter you want to use in the format of FILTER1, FILTER2, FILTER3. e.g. 'SF Stage, SF Industry, SF Category'

property.name: filterLogic
property.label: Custom Filter Logic
property.description: Define custom filter logic using field numbers. e.g., '(1 or 2) AND 3'

property.name: customFields
property.label: Custom Fields
property.description: Enter the fields you want to include in the format of OBJECT.FIELD1, OBJECT.FIELD2, OBJECT.FIELD3. e.g., 'Opportunity.Name, Opportunity.StageName, Account.Industry'

property.name: customSAMLlogin
property.label: Custom SAML domain
property.description: Only set if you've configured a custom sign in option with Marq

property.name: enableLock
property.label: Enable Lock
property.description: Toggle to allow users to lock elements on a page or project.

property.name: enableDownload
property.label: Enable Download
property.description: Allow users to download projects in various formats.

property.name: enablePrint
property.label: Enable Print
property.description: Allow users to create print orders for connected vendors.

property.name: enableCollaborate
property.label: Enable Collaborate
property.description: Allow users to collaborate within their Marq account.

property.name: enableShare
property.label: Enable Share
property.description: Allow users to share projects to external platforms like social media.

property.name: enableSaveName
property.label: Enable Save Name
property.description: Allow specifying the name of the 'save' action button.

property.name: enableBackButton
property.label: Enable Back Button
property.description: Enable the back button to return to the platform.

property.name: allowPDF
property.label: Allow PDF
property.description: Enable PDF as a file type for downloads.

property.name: allowJPG
property.label: Allow JPG
property.description: Enable JPG as a file type for downloads.

property.name: allowPNG
property.label: Allow PNG
property.description: Enable PNG as a file type for downloads.

property.name: allowGIF
property.label: Allow GIF
property.description: Enable GIF as a file type for downloads.

property.name: allowMP4
property.label: Allow MP4
property.description: Enable MP4 as a file type for downloads.

property.name: showDashboard
property.label: Show Dashboard
property.description: Enable the dashboard tab to show to the user

property.name: showDocuments
property.label: Show Documents
property.description: Enable the documents tab to show the user's projects

property.name: showTemplates
property.label: Show Templates
property.description: Enable templates tab to show templates to the user
